item.description:
Let's celebrate the Labor Day weekend, the unofficial end of summer - with a get-together on the deck and in the pool at Gloria and Mike's home in Windsor. Definitely a family event, so bring the kids along!

We'll start around 2:00, throw some food on the grill around 5:00, and party on the deck at least until dark, when we can always move inside.

Please bring something to share for food and if you have a particular libation you would like, bring that along too. Don't forget suits and towels!

Some of you know the history of planning pool parties at Gloria's, so we'll try for Saturday with a rain date of Sunday!

Since this is a private home, directions will be sent to those who RSVP. Also, you should know this home has a dog (and maybe even two by then).

If you can add a comment about what you might be bringing food-wise, that will help with the planning.
item.name: Last blast of summer - pool party
